                           Release Notes

Comments :
Part four in the Hannibal Lecter Quadrilogy. Having escaped the asylum 
in "Silence of the Lambs," Dr Lecter goes into hiding in Florence, Italy. 
Back in America, Mason Verger, an old victim of the doctor&#039;s, seeks revenge. 
Disfigured and confined to a life-support system, he plans to draw Lecter 
out of his hiding place, using the one thing he truly cares for: Clarice 
Starling.

Director : Ridley Scott

Writers: Thomas Harris
         David Mamet
